member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.CodeInsight.Services.Util.ActionUtil.CommitAndWaitForCaches(JetBrains.ReSharper.Psi.PsiManager,JetBrains.ActionManagement.IActionHandler)
member.summary: When a PSI-consuming action is about to be executed, commits the documents and waits for the caches to become idle, displaying the cancelable modal UI progress.
member.param: PSI manager to wait for, identifies the solution.
Action handler from which the action name is retrieved, to display in the progress UI.
member.returns: Whether the caches are, finally, idle (the wait might be cancelled).

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.CodeInsight.Services.Util.ActionUtil.ExecuteWithCachesReady(JetBrains.ReSharper.Psi.PsiManager,System.String,System.Action)
member.summary: When a PSI-consuming action is about to be executed, commits the documents and waits for the caches to become idle, displaying the cancelable modal UI progress.
member.param: PSI manager to wait for, identifies the solution.
Activity to execute if the caches are ready OK.
member.returns: Whether the caches are, finally, idle (the wait might be cancelled).
